RMIGameOfNim

Class ComputerControlledPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMIGameOfNim.Player
      • RMIGameOfNim.ComputerControlledPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ComputerControlledPlayer
extends Player
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The computer controlled player extends the player class and implements runable, so it can be assigned to a thread. It will always make the best possible move given any number of marbles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerControlledPlayer(int totalMarbles, GameLogicEngine myMatch)
      Default construtor used to populate the list smartMoves

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int makeSmartMove(int currentMarbles)
      Make a smart move based upon the winning strategy of producing marble counts of values of 2 to ther power of n minus 1, i.e. 1, 3, 7, 15, 31, 63, etc.
      void run()
      Thread start / run method

    • Method Detail

      • makeSmartMove

        public int makeSmartMove(int currentMarbles)
        Make a smart move based upon the winning strategy of producing marble counts of values of 2 to ther power of n minus 1, i.e. 1, 3, 7, 15, 31, 63, etc.
        Parameters:
        currentMarbles - Count of the current marbles to select from
        Returns:
        Integer value of a smart move that will be based upon the winning strategy for this game of nim

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread start / run method
